about.title: Me
about.description: Ajith is a software developer at Strollby who loves building fast, accessible web apps. He enjoys writing about tech, geeking out over movies, and playing football.

personal.title: Things I ü§ç
personal.description:
I spend almost all my time in front of my computer, and even when I‚Äôm out of the office, I'll always keep myself busy with some random side project. When I'm not tinkering with something, I love watching good movies‚ÄîThe Lord of the Rings is my favorite.

I also enjoy reading, with One Hundred Years of Solitude and Mayyazhippuzhayude Theerangalil being my top picks.

Music-wise, I'm a big fan of Passenger, and Circles is my go-to song. And when I need a break from screens, you'll probably find me playing football.
